A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I want so bad to like this movie. I want so bad to love it. I was so entertained throughout it\, but had a few too many \"oh\" moments. When I reflect about it\, I just feel disappointed about too many of the plot choices\, and changes they added to starwars lore.  I really enjoyed TFA and rogue one but this adds together to just not feel like it paid off. I'm usually good at rationalizing myself into being positive about movies but I find it hard. while I might like it more on a second viewing\, I shouldn't have to.
